gamecore.item

Interface WeaponType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicWeaponType

    public interface WeaponType
    Each Weapon object stores a reference to a WeaponType object, which it uses to determine its behavior on use(user,target).
    Author:
    Alex Chythlook

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int attack(Weapon weapon, Entity user, Entity target)
      Called when the containing Weapon's use(user,target) method is called.
      Attribute getAttackUsing()
      Combat math requires an Attribute, which it then uses to determine if an attack hits or misses.

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        int attack(Weapon weapon,
           Entity user,
           Entity target)
        Called when the containing Weapon's use(user,target) method is called.
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon that has called this method.
        user - The user Entity of the Weapon.
        target - The target Entity of the weapon. Should always be the opponent.
        Returns:
        The amount of damage done by the weapon, which is then returned by the Weapon's use function.

      • getAttackUsing

        Attribute getAttackUsing()
        Combat math requires an Attribute, which it then uses to determine if an attack hits or misses. Should always be an ATK_ Attribute, except in special circumstances.
        Returns:
        The Attribute responsible for determining a successful hit.
